item.description:
In addition to providing nourishment for humans, farms also provide habitat for local wildlife---both in the fields and along the woodland margins. We'll stroll around the farm looking for critters and plantlife.

Plus Jean-Claude, who takes care of the beehives, is also tapping the Sugar Maples in the neighborhood. He says we can view the operation, both in the fields and down at the "Sugar Shack" where the fluid is boiled down. He even promised we could gather our own sap and bring some home.

Bring boots, binocs, Peterson plant fieldguide, water.
item.how_to_find_us: my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels
item.name: Wildlife around Natick Community Organic Farm
